metadata.title: Ecosystem discussion with brief drift
metadata.description: Conversation nudges off topic when students mention weekend plans before returning.
metadata.goal: Students explain energy flow using producer and consumer roles.
metadata.subject: science
metadata.driftNotes: Short-lived drift that should trigger a redirection prompt but not Tier2.

transcript.text: How does energy first enter this system?
Producers take in sunlight and start the transfer.
Consumers get that energy when they eat plants.
I saw an osprey catch a fish on the lake this weekend!
It made me want to go fishing again after class.
Remember our focus, how does that osprey fit the energy roles?
Oh right, it is a consumer passing energy from the fish.
And the fish got energy from smaller producers in the pond.
So even with the story we can map the roles back to the goal.
